title: About Me
text:
With over 10 years of experience in market research and social services, I‚Äôve successfully led various market research and survey projects. These projects honed my skills in quantitative and qualitative research methods, statistical reasoning, and project management.
With a Master‚Äôs degree in Public Administration and a Business Intelligence and Data Analytics Certification, I have a strong understanding of the theoretical foundation of data analysis, which I apply to real-world business problems.
I thrive on turning complex numerical data into meaningful patterns and predictions. My experience includes working with large datasets in research projects, where I utilized Excel, R, MySQL, and Tableau to uncover insights that informed strategic decisions. My attention to detail and accuracy has been commended by my supervisors and colleagues alike.
As I transition into the world of data science and AI, I am eager to apply my research background to a corporate setting. I am particularly interested in roles that allow me to analyze consumer data to optimize product development and marketing strategies. I am ready to leverage my analytical expertise to make a tangible impact on business growth.
I‚Äôm actively seeking opportunities, and my passion for AI and data science drives my desire to make a meaningful contribution.
I look forward to connecting with new professionals. Feel free to add me on LinkedIn or email me at zarbi786@gmail.com.

title: Abdul Zarbi
text:
I‚Äôm a data analyst and researcher with 10 years of experience transforming complex research data into actionable business insights. I specialize in market research, survey design, and statistical analysis with a proven track record of leading projects that drive strategic decision-making.


With expertise in both quantitative and qualitative research methods, I help organizations understand their markets, customers, and opportunities. My work combines rigorous statistical analysis with clear storytelling to deliver insights that matter.
I‚Äôm currently expanding my expertise into AI and data science, bringing my deep research background into cutting-edge analytics. My goal is to leverage advanced data techniques to optimize product development, enhance marketing strategies, and create measurable business impact.




Over 10 years of social research and market analysis experience.
Expert in turning large datasets into meaningful patterns and predictions.
Skilled at building interactive dashboards and compelling data visualizations.
Strong project management and stakeholder communication abilities
Passionate about using data to solve real business problems.




Languages & Analytics: R, Quarto, SQL, Tableau, Github, LLM applications
Research Tools: Excel, SPSS, NVivo, ODK, Kobo Toolbox, Survey Monkey, Advance MD, Client Track
Specialties: Data Visualization, Statistical Modeling, Survey Design, Market Research, Quantitative and Qualitative Analysis
